publisher.value: Health Level Seven Australia (Patient Administration WG)

description.value: The Service Provision Conditions Australian Concepts code system defines concepts that identify the conditions under which a healthcare service is available/offered.

copyright.value: HL7 AustraliaÂ© 2018+; Licensed Under Creative Commons No Rights Reserved.

definition.value: All or some of the services provided are offered free of charge.
All or some of the services provided are offered free of charge, however the decision on the costs associated with the service or procedures offered will depend on a means test outcome.
Bulk Billing is offered under Medicare.
All or some of the services provided are offered at the Healthcare Service
All or some of the services provided are offered on a donation basis. The expectation on the donation is not defined.
All or some of the services provided are subject to a co-payment, which may be in combination with Private Insurance.
All or some of the services provided are offered subject to a payment in combination with Bulk Billing.
